title: Which two world famous authors died on November 22, 1963? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: There were three authors who were world-famous and died on November 22, 1963. Aldous Huxley, the author of “Brave New World”, “Chrome Yellow” and “Eyeless in Gaza” (to name three of my own favourites)C.S. Lewis, creator of the Narnia books and “The Screwtape Letters”John F. Kennedy, the author of “Profiles in Courage”, “The Strategy of Peace” and “A Nation of Immigrants” (published posthumously in 1964)All three were famous in their own right though, of course, Mr. Kennedy was best-known as the President of the United States of America.
